title: Theendi Theendi Lyrics Bala
stanzas:
theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye.

neeye kadhal noolagam
kavidhai noolgal aayiram
kadhal theeviravaadhiyin
aayutham aanadhe.

enai theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye.

neeye kadhal noolagam
kavidhai noolgal aayiram
kadhal theeviravaadhiyin
aayutham aanadhu.

thodanginaai koosum
idangalaal.
nagangale keerum
padangalaai

degam enbathenna
or aadai kopuram.
aadai nazhuvum podhu
or kaama por varum.

kurumbugal kuraiyaadhu
thazhumbugal theriyaadhu.
kaigal meiyudhu meiyudhu
raegaigal theiyudhu

theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye.

neeye kadhal noolagam
kavidhai noolgal aayiram
kadhal theeviravaadhiyin
aayutham aanadhu.

theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye

iruvarae paarkum pada vizhaa
thirai idum moga thiruvizhaa

maarbin oaram saindhu
nee koondhal koithidu
podhum endra podhum
nee kaetu vaadhidu.

vaervarai saaikkaamal
mudhal puyal mudiyaadhu.
kaaman thaevidhu thaevidhu
vaervaiyil moozhgudhu.

theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye.

neeye kadhal noolagam
kavidhai noolgal aayiram
kadhal theeviravaadhiyin
aayutham aanadhe.

theendi theendi
theeyai moottugiraaye.
thoondi thoondi
thaenai oottugiraaye.

seo.title: Theendi Theendi Lyrics Bala
seo.description: Get the complete Theendi Theendi Lyrics Bala from Bala. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Sujatha Mohan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Bala, Yuvan, Sujatha Mohan, Unnikrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
